definition[0]: a liquid soap for washing your hair
example[0]: What kind of shampoo do you use?
definition[1]: when someone washes your hair using shampoo
note[0]: shampoo and set (=when someone washes your hair and then dries it so that it has a particular style, especially using curlers)
example[2]: $21 for a shampoo, cut, and blow-dry
definition[2]: a liquid used for cleaning carpets
example[3]: She showered and shampooed her short dark hair.
